title: Brain Stimulation Could Limit the Urge to Binge Eat, Study Says
description: A small study demonstrated that deep brain stimulation, used for people with Parkinsonâ€™s disease, can limit an urge to overeat.
dc:creator: Gina Kolata
media:credit: Andri Tambunan for The New York Times
media:description: Robyn Baldwin of Citrus Heights, Calif., who said she had tried several diets, no longer felt irresistible urges to binge after a device was implanted in her brain.
